description: Variation of condition nos. 2 (compliance with approved drawings) and 10 (trees and landscaping) of planning permission 23/06322, to allow: reconfiguration of approved condenser unit layouts within basement; reconfiguration of flank elevation fenestration with 2 additional proposed windows at second floor level and amendments to raised ground floor window (entrance lobby); retention of all previously approved roof light positions on front elevation; relocation of 1no. rooflight on flank elevation, size to be retained; reduction in size of approved rooflight on rear roof elevation; alterations to roof lights at lower ground floor (family room) and raised ground floor (lobby); relocation of raised ground floor front door to its original location, along with amendments to the front portico design, to match neighbouring property No.38; works to the boundary wall to Old Church Street to allow for deeper foundations; and amendments to landscaping and planting layouts in rear garden.
